content: Faculty and PIs | MIT LIDS Jump to navigation Home / People / Faculty and PIs Faculty and PIs LIDS Faculty/PIs are faculty who conduct most of their research in LIDS, and are core members of IDSS. LIDS PIs are senior researchers who conduct their research in LIDS. Affiliate members of LIDS are other faculty or senior researchers who have a substantial intellectual engagement with the LIDS community.
